title: Ukraine conflict to test resilience of global financial system, IMF warns - Reuters
content: Ukraine conflict to test resilience of global financial system, IMF warns  Reuters
description: Russia's invasion of Ukraine has driven up financial stability risks "on several fronts" and will test the resilience of the global financial system at a time when interest rates are rising sharply, the International Monetary Fund (IMF) warned in its biannual Global Financial Stability Report on Tuesday.
